scripts.lint: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const walk=(d)=>fs.readdirSync(d,{withFileTypes:true}).flatMap(f=>{if(f.name==='node_modules'||f.name==='.git')return [];const p=path.join(d,f.name);if(f.isDirectory())return walk(p);return p.endsWith('.js')?[p]:[]});walk('.').forEach((file)=>{new Function(fs.readFileSync(file,'utf8'));});console.log('Lint check passed');"
